item.title: 5G phones to buy under ₹10,000 in January 2025: Moto G35, Infinix Hot 50, Poco C75 and more | Mint - Mint
item.description:
5G phones to buy under ₹10,000 in January 2025: Moto G35, Infinix Hot 50, Poco C75 and more

Publication Date: January 2025, Source: Live Mint

This article outlines the best 5G smartphones available under ₹10,000 in January 2025, emphasizing their features, specifications, and battery life.

  • Moto G35 5G: 6.72-inch Full HD display, powered by UNISOC T760, 5,000mAh battery, 50MP camera.
  • Infinix Hot 50 5G: 6.7-inch HD display, MediaTek Dimensity 6300, 48MP camera, 5,000mAh battery.
  • Poco C75 5G: 6.88-inch HD display, MediaTek Helio G81, 50MP camera, 5,160mAh battery.
  • Vivo T3 Lite: 6.56-inch HD display, MediaTek Dimensity 6300, dual 50MP setup, 5G support.

item.title: iPhone 17 Pro Leaks: Specs, Camera, Design, Price in India, All We Know So Far - Times Now
item.description:
iPhone 17 Pro Leaks: Specs, Camera, Design, Price in India

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

Leaked details about the iPhone 17 Pro reveal potential design changes, upgraded A19 Pro chip, advanced camera features, and a September 2025 launch.

  • Expected return to aluminium body with a hybrid rear panel.
  • Upgraded A19 Pro chip with 12GB of RAM.
  • Narrow Dynamic Island and new facial recognition technology.
  • Improved display with anti-reflective coating.
  • 24MP front-facing camera as a major upgrade.
  • Expected price in India: Rs 1,19,900.
  • Anticipated launch in September 2025.
“The iPhone 17 Pro seems all set to redefine flagships.”

The iPhone 17 Pro is generating excitement with its expected upgrades, scheduled for launch in 2025, as Apple continues to innovate in the smartphone market.

item.title: Redmi Note 14 Series To Launch Alongside Redmi Watch 5, Buds 6 Pro: From Price To Specifications, Here's What We Know - ABP Live
item.description:
Redmi Note 14 Series To Launch Alongside Redmi Watch 5, Buds 6 Pro

Publication Date: January 3, 2025

Source: Xiaomi Announcement

The Redmi Note 14 series will make its global debut on January 10, 2025, alongside the Redmi Buds 6 Pro and Redmi Watch 5. This marks the series' expansion following its successful launch in India and China.

Key Points

  • Redmi Note 14 series debuted in India in December 2024.
  • Global launch set for January 10, 2025.
  • Pricing starts at CNY 1,199 for the base model of Redmi Note 14.
  • Notable specifications include a 200-megapixel camera and fast charging capabilities.
  • Redmi Buds 6 Pro offer up to 55dB ANC, priced starting at CNY 399.
  • Redmi Watch 5 features a 2.07-inch AMOLED display with a starting price of CNY 599.
— Xiaomi (@Xiaomi) January 3, 2025

This global introduction reinforces Xiaomi's commitment to expanding its flagship smartphone lineup and accompanying accessories.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra Release Date, Price, Design, Cameras, Specs, All Latest Leaks Here - Times Now

item.title: iPhone SE 4 Price Leaks Ahead Of Rumoured Launch This Year: Here’s What To Expect - Times Now
item.description:
iPhone SE 4 Price Leaks Ahead Of Rumoured Launch This Year: Here’s What To Expect

Published on: Not provided

Source: Not provided

Apple is reportedly gearing up to launch its next-generation iPhone SE 4, expected early this year. While the company hasn’t officially announced details, a wave of leaks and rumours has given Apple fans plenty to discuss.

  • The iPhone SE 4 is expected to come with a higher price tag compared to its predecessor.
  • A recent report suggests a price of over KRW 8,00,000 (around Rs 46,700) globally, likely under $500.
  • The design may resemble the iPhone 14, with a larger 6.1-inch OLED display and Face ID.
  • It is rumoured to feature Apple’s A18 chip, 8GB of RAM, and a 48MP camera.
  • The inclusion of a USB-C charging port and 5G connectivity with Apple's in-house modem is also expected.
  • In India, the price could approach Rs 49,900.
“Only time will tell if these upgrades are worth it in terms of the price hike when the device is finally released.”

The iPhone SE 4 promises significant enhancements, but a price increase raises questions on its affordability and value for budget-conscious consumers.

item.title: Poco X7, Poco X7 Pro India Launch Roundup: Check Full Specifications, Availability, and Expected Pricing - Gizbot
item.description:
Poco X7, Poco X7 Pro India Launch Roundup: Check Full Specifications, Availability, and Expected Pricing

Published: Sunday, January 5, 2025 - Source: Gizbot

The Poco X7 series is set to launch in India on January 9, 2025, featuring the Poco X7 and Poco X7 Pro models. The Poco X7 Pro will be a rebranded Redmi Turbo 4.

  • The launch event will be livestreamed on YouTube and mi.com starting at 5:30 PM IST.
  • Prices are expected to be under Rs 30,000 for the Poco X7 Pro and under Rs 25,000 for the Poco X7.
  • Poco X7 Pro specifications include MediaTek's Dimensity 8400-Ultra SoC and a 50MP triple-camera setup.
  • Poco X7 rumored specs feature MediaTek Dimensity 7300-Ultra, 5,110mAh battery, and 120Hz AMOLED display.
"The Poco X7 Pro is expected to debut with an impressive AnTuTu score exceeding 1.7 million points."

This launch is anticipated to stir interest in the mid-range smartphone market in India, especially among gamers and tech enthusiasts.

item.title: Here’s what you can get at India’s ₹100 crore addresses | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Luxury Living: Exploring India's ₹100 Crore Homes

Publication Date: N/A Source: Mint

In India, the dream of owning a home priced at over ₹100 crore reflects the aspirations of its billionaires, showcasing opulent features like sea-facing bedrooms and exclusive amenities.

  • 185 billionaires in India are pursuing luxurious homes costing over ₹100 crore.
  • Some properties feature 800-1200 sq. ft. sea-facing bedrooms in prime locations like Pali Hill, Mumbai.
  • Luxury amenities often include golf courses in courtyards and top-tier culinary services.
The final stage of Maslow’s hierarchy is self-actualization, achieved for some through exclusive real estate investments.

This trend exemplifies the rising demand for luxury real estate in India, reflecting both wealth and lifestyle aspirations among its elite.

item.title: iPhone 16 Pro Max Price Cut: Grab it only under Rs 50,000 with amazing deals - Here's how - ET Now
item.description:
iPhone 16 Pro Max Price Cut: Grab it only under Rs 50,000 with amazing deals - Here's how?

Publication Date: January 5, 2025 | Source: ET Now

The iPhone 16 Plus, launched at the ‘It’s Glowtime’ event, is now accessible in India for under Rs 50,000 due to significant discounts available on Flipkart.

  • Originally priced at Rs 89,990, the 128GB variant can be bought for Rs 45,850 after discounts and exchange offers.
  • The deal includes an immediate 5% discount and additional exchange savings.
  • The iPhone 16 Plus features a 6.7-inch display, 48MP camera, and is powered by the A18 Bionic chip.
  • Apple Intelligence enhances user experience with advanced features across apps.
“With powerful performance, a stunning display, an incredible camera, and innovative features, the iPhone 16 Plus offers an unbeatable package.”

This price cut presents a fantastic opportunity for consumers looking to switch to a premium smartphone at an affordable price.

item.title: Tech charge of your wellness: How apps and wearables are redefining health management - The Financial Express
item.description:
Tech Charge of Your Wellness: How Apps and Wearables are Redefining Health Management

Date: [Publication Date] Source: [Source]

Wellness has become a key focus for consumer technology, with brands racing to enhance the health management features of their products. The growth of digital health applications and wearables has transformed how individuals monitor and manage their health, leading to significant market potential.

Key Points

  • A surge in wellness-focused apps and wearables is redefining health management.
  • Global market for wearable healthcare devices is expected to reach $114.8 billion by 2033.
  • Healthcare innovation in India is projected to double to $60 billion by FY2028.
  • Over 70% of survey respondents expect convenience and quality in health management.
  • Healthtech startups in India are rapidly growing, expected to continue expanding.
“Sessions like ‘step aside from computer’ or ‘reducing work anxiety’ have encouraged me to constantly keep tabs on my body.” - Vaijanthi Dharaswamy

As smart devices become more sophisticated, they transform into personal health companions, empowering users to make informed health decisions. Companies continue to innovate, integrating wellness features into daily life.

item.title: How to get all Squid Game 2 Operators in Black Ops 6 and Warzone - Sportskeeda
item.description:
How to get all Squid Game 2 Operators in Black Ops 6 and Warzone

Date: January 17, 2025

Source: Sportskeeda

Call of Duty has introduced several new Operator skins in collaboration with Netflix's Squid Game, featuring ways to unlock these characters in Black Ops 6 and Warzone.

  • Numerous Operators are available, including Player 006, Player 115, Front Man, Young-Hee, and more.
  • Some cosmetics are free to unlock, while others require Call of Duty Points (CP).
  • The article explores the methods to unlock each operator, including tasks like earning XP and purchasing bundles.
"That covers all the Squid Game 2 Operators in Black Ops 6 and Warzone... the event is fun and a great way to kick off 2025 for Call of Duty fans."

The collaboration provides exciting content for players, with a mix of free and paid options for customization.

item.title: Apple Intelligence now takes up almost twice as much room on your iPhone as it used to - TechRadar
item.description:
Apple Intelligence now takes up almost twice as much room on your iPhone as it used to

Date: January 3, 2025
Source: TechRadar

Apple Intelligence now requires 7GB of storage with the new iOS 18.2 update, up from 4GB in the previous version, due to added features and expected further increases in the future.

  • Apple Intelligence now needs 7GB, an increase from 4GB.
  • This increase is attributed to new features in iOS 18.2.
  • Future requirements are projected to grow further.
"If you're running low on storage space on your device, then you may have to think twice about having Apple Intelligence enabled."

Apple's focus on local AI processing enhances privacy but poses storage challenges for users. Those needing to manage their device's space may need to reconsider their use of Apple Intelligence.

item.title: Oppo Reno 13 and 13 Pro Indian launch date announced - Notebookcheck.net
item.description:
Oppo Reno 13 and 13 Pro Indian Launch Date Announced

Date: January 4, 2025

Source: Notebookcheck

The Oppo Reno 13 series, featuring the Dimensity 8350 processor, is set to launch in India, introducing new stylish color options for mobile photography enthusiasts.

  • The Reno 13 series will include models with AI capabilities and ColorOS based on Android 15.
  • The launch is scheduled for January 9, 2025, in partnership with Flipkart.
  • The series introduces new color options: Mist Lavender, Graphite Gray, Ivory White, and an exclusive Luminous Blue for the Reno 13.
  • The Reno 13 Pro will feature a high-end periscope zoom lens.
“Stylish Every Moment” - Oppo on the new Reno 13 series.

This upcoming launch reflects Oppo's commitment to offering cutting-edge technology and design in the Indian smartphone market.

item.title: Apple Fitness Plus partners with Strava for enhanced integration, new workout features - Kalinga TV
item.description:
Apple Fitness Plus Partners with Strava for Enhanced Integration

Publication Date: January 3

Source: The Verge

Apple Fitness Plus and Strava have announced a new integration that enhances workout features for users of both platforms.

This integration will provide detailed workout summaries, personalized content, and unique appearances by athletes from the Strava community.

  • Seamless integration of Apple Fitness Plus workouts into the Strava app.
  • Users will now see thumbnails of workouts, including important details like episode numbers, music genres, and trainers.
  • Strava users can access a three-month free trial of Fitness Plus.
  • Featured athletes from Strava will appear in special Fitness Plus workouts.
  • Future enhancements may include more features that connect users with their friends on Strava.
“This collaboration helps to bring Fitness Plus more in line with other Strava integrations and offer a deeper, more cohesive experience for athletes who want to track every aspect of their fitness journey.” - Jay Blahnik, Apple’s VP of Fitness Technologies

This partnership not only improves functionality but also aims to diversify the fitness routines of users, signaling a shift in how Apple has traditionally offered its Fitness Plus trials.

item.title: Samsung is making one big mistake with One UI 7 - Android Authority
item.description:
Samsung Faces Criticism for Lack of Feature Discoverability in One UI 7

Publication Date: October 2023

Source: Android Authority

The article discusses Samsung's One UI 7 and the significant hurdle of feature discoverability, highlighting user frustrations and comparisons with Google's Pixel experience.

  • Samsung's Tips app does not effectively notify users of new features in One UI 7.
  • Pixel Tips app from Google actively encourages users to explore new features after updates.
  • Despite One UI 7 being a substantial update, many improvements may go unnoticed by users.
  • The author urges Samsung to improve communication about new features to enhance user experience.
“One UI 7 is a very substantial update, but unless Samsung makes a big fuss about it, it will go unnoticed.”

In conclusion, better promotion of One UI 7's features is essential for user engagement and appreciation of new capabilities.

item.title: Google Shows How To Confirm Indexing Issues Due To JavaScript - Search Engine Journal
item.description:
Google Demonstrates How to Address Indexing Issues Related to JavaScript

Publication Date: Recent

Source: SearchNorwich

Google's Martin Splitt explains how to identify and debug crawling and indexing issues associated with JavaScript, emphasizing that these problems are usually not caused by JavaScript itself.

  • JavaScript is not typically the root cause of SEO issues.
  • Confirmation bias can lead SEOs to wrongly attribute SEO problems to JavaScript.
  • Martin Splitt offers tools for diagnosing rendering issues, including Google Search Console and Chrome Dev Tools.
  • He suggests that many misunderstandings arise from a lack of knowledge about how to debug JavaScript.

“…it seems to me, as someone on the Google side of things, that SEOs look for clues that allow them to blame things they’re seeing on JavaScript.” - Martin Splitt

In conclusion, understanding JavaScript debugging can save valuable time and better address the actual SEO issues faced by websites.

item.title: iPhone SE 4 may cost more than its predecessor - India Today
item.description:
iPhone SE 4 may cost more than its predecessor

Published On: Jan 4, 2025
Published By: Aman Rashid

The iPhone SE 4 is rumored to be launching early next year, with leaks suggesting a potential price increase compared to its predecessor, the iPhone SE 3.

  • The iPhone SE 4 is expected to cost over KRW 8,00,000 (approx. Rs 46,000) in South Korea and under $500 (approx. Rs 43,000) globally.
  • A noticeable price jump is anticipated compared to the SE 3, which started at $429 (approx. Rs 43,900) in India.
  • Upgraded design features may include a 6.1-inch OLED display, Face ID, and Apple’s A18 chip.
  • 5G connectivity is expected to be a standout feature, powered by Apple's in-house 5G modem.
  • Apple faces challenges in keeping the price under Rs 50,000 while including modern features such as a 48-megapixel camera and USB-C charging.
“The big question for Indian customers is whether the iPhone SE 4 can remain under the Rs 50,000 mark.”

As consumers await further announcements from Apple, the balance between price and features will be crucial for the upcoming iPhone SE 4's market reception.

item.title: Forget Apple Intelligence – I want the next iPhone SE to be a bastion of privacy - TechRadar
item.description:
The Next iPhone SE: A Privacy-Focused Alternative

Publication Date: 2024

Source: TechRadar

Recent discussions suggest that the upcoming iPhone SE 4 could prioritize privacy over artificial intelligence features, allowing users to maintain control over their personal data in an increasingly AI-driven market.

  • Gareth Beavis argues that Apple can capitalize on budget iPhones while enhancing privacy features.
  • The article raises concerns about AI's potential privacy invasions on smartphones.
  • Calls for a phone that serves core functionalities without advanced AI features.
  • Speculation that Apple may position the iPhone SE 4 as an entry point into Apple Intelligence despite privacy concerns.
"I think there could be a real refreshed market for phones that avoid all the fancy AI bits and simply work as a phone, camera, web browser and casual games machine."

In conclusion, there’s a significant demand for privacy-focused smartphones as consumers seek to mitigate data tracking and AI integrations in favor of straightforward device functionality.

item.title: Samsung One UI 7 Home Up Features: Animation Tuner and More - Sammy Fans
item.description:
Samsung One UI 7 Home Up Features: Animation Tuner and More

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Sammy Fans

Samsung announced significant updates to the Home Up app with the One UI 7 upgrade, set to roll out fully in January. The updates enhance customization options for the home screen.

  • One UI Home Integration: Easy customization of the home screen.
  • No Grid Restrictions: Unlimited grid customization for home screen layout.
  • Home Screen Stickers: Add personal stickers to the home screen.
  • Animation Tuning: Adjust animation speed and styles, customize gestures, and transparency effects.
  • Hide Favorites: Clean up the home screen by hiding favorite apps.
  • Custom Folders and Buttons: Customize folder sizes and arrange the Apps button freely.
  • Edge Panel Customization: New features for better Edge panel usability.
"You can change how your home screen looks or behaves right from where you are." - Samsung

The new features of the Home Up app in One UI 7 are set to enhance user customization and personalization, allowing users to create a home screen experience that fits their preferences better.
